name: Fill The Pumpkin
description:
Created for the 8th  edition of One Minute Game Jam, hosted by "warsugs"

Theme: Pumpkins

Fill the pumpkins with CANDIES to complete the levels! 

Move your mouse to direct them inside PUMPKINS!

The red cannon spawns CANDY CORNS: move it with A-D or with the arrow keys!

And watch out for DARK PUMPKINS!!!
